title: Improving Custom Mode
body:
Hi, not sure if this is the right place to post this question, but does anyone else think custom mode should be more customisable? Like, options to start off with: extra gold, a higher level, and to play any champion you want? This would mean that people can try the champions they're about to spend 6300 ip on, try out how well their full build works without having to wait +40 mins to get it, and skip some of the early laning phase stuff and just try out different combos etc.
Hopefully if enough people agree Riot might consider this?

replies.body: This is a great idea man Riot should do this.

I very much agree. Then again, what do i know.

-GL,HF
What about disabling monsters and minions? This idea is great!

I'd like to have all the past game-modes in Custom.

Pretty sure others would.

This should have been in from the get go, most video-games nowadays are *assumed* to have these kinds of things if they're to have a self-hosting multiplayer mode available.

If it wasn't included in the initial versions of the game, well, with all the work that they've set themselves to maintain and uphold for the moment, it's not something that's going to happen soon, if at all.
